description:
"Sankishi is breaking up?!" As the shocking news rattles the Wide Show, Sankishi announces that they will withdraw their participation in Dream Fes. DearDream and KUROFUNE are determined not to lose out to their senior artists in the battle to take Sankishi`s place as the final act at the festival, but their feelings are complicated...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Now Is the Moment to Change
